version_description:
New history data storage (history upgrade will start after opening of the app and it may take few minutes).
iOS 9 support.
Bug fixes.

New history data storage (history upgrade will start after opening of the app and it may take few minutes).
iOS 9 support.
Bug fixes.

New improved design.
New chart of noise in the room during the night.
Better management of your recordings and reports.
Bug fixes.

History export to CSV file.
Minor improvements.
Bug fixes.

Multiple sending recordings (iMessage, email, AirDrop, etc.).
Bluetooth audio support.
Minor improvements.
Bug fixes.

Added new languages: Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, German, Spanish, Slovak.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We’re listening to your feedback and working hard to improve the application. Here’s what’s new:
- Snoring detection improved.
- Automatic sleep recording.
- Sorting of the recordings (by time, by loudest, by snoring).
- Side menu updated.
- Reminder added.
- Average time in bed added to statistics.
- FAQ added.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

We’re listening to your feedback and working hard to improve the application. Here’s what’s new:
- iOS 11 support.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

We’re listening to your feedback and working hard to improve the application. Here’s what’s new:
- Automatic sleep recording improved.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

New, mature and smart snoring detection. The latest update brings the most advanced technology of sound processing. 
By using artificial intelligence (A.I.), new Apple machine learning technology and a large number of snoring samples, our application is able to achieve the high accuracy in snoring detection and in statistics of night reports.

The accuracy of snoring detection will be improved by continuous adding of sound samples.

No more undetected snoring!

New, mature and smart snoring detection. The latest update brings the most advanced technology of sound processing. 
By using artificial intelligence (A.I.), new Apple machine learning technology and a large number of snoring samples, our application is able to achieve the high accuracy in snoring detection and in statistics of night reports.
The accuracy of snoring detection will be improved by continuous adding of sound samples. Now user can report wrong detection.

No more undetected snoring!

Snoring detection updated.
Thanks to the users who reported a wrong snoring detection.

Snoring detection updated.
Thanks to the users who reported a wrong snoring detection.

Snoring detection updated.
Thanks to the users who reported a wrong snoring detection.

Snoring detection updated.
Thanks to the users who reported a wrong snoring detection.
Fix for vibration and microphone error ('!rec').
Notification added when recording is interrupted (microphone error '!rec'). Tapping the notification will resume recording.
New languages added: French, Chinese (Traditional), Korean, Russian

Improved recordings sharing:
- Share as video (for supporting more social networks).
- Share as audio.
- Trim.

Bug fixes.
